attributes.title: This app is horrible
attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible! My phone barely works now I can’t even type... I just had to take my phone to the Apple Store because it hacked my phone. Made it die...completely dead!!my phone was not turning on!! Now I also have a giant yellow line across my screen for some reason I cannot believe this just happened!! NEVER GET THIS APP!!!

attributes.title: Don’t download this app!!
attributes.review:
after taking nearly 10 minutes to download and living through countless errors that shut the app down I realized a darker truth. This app is actually Chinese and is taking all of your data. If you want all of your data to go to the Chinese 😮 then do not download this app! China bad! China!! USA!! USA!!! USA!!!! If you want China to destroy America and give you coronavirus do not download this app. USA. 

-USA

attributes.title: this app is awful!!!
attributes.review: i can’t believe i actually spent some of my iphones storage on this god forsaken app, i’m ashamed to even have it on my history of downloaded apps🤮🤮🤮🤮 it’s glitchy, it crashes, way too many 404 error messages, AND my battery life has gotten ten times worse after downloading it, so my phone will def die before i can finish this revi—

attributes.title: Trash🤮
attributes.review: Besides the long download that took 3 and a half weeks when I opened this app my minecraft server was being wack and all the zombies were crying and being depressed and killing them selves and the next day I came home my dog buddy445 started talking to me and he jumped out my window and I asked why he said trump forced him to now I have to go buy him bandaid brands thinks a lot trump🤮🦴🐕

attributes.title: Don’t get this App ‼️
attributes.review:
It took 1 month to download and my iPhone crashed as soon as I open it and I took it to the apple store and they said that if I don’t dispose of the phone it could explode but I didn’t believe them so I took it home and it blew up next thing you know I purchase a temporary iPhone 8 and try to download it got a virus on my phone 

What ever u do don’t download it

attributes.title: DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS APP!
attributes.review: I had a feeling i was being watched and called the police. They then asked me what race i was. I didn’t know why that mattered until i said i was black and they said they couldn’t help me because it was against the ✨🧚🏾🍊President’s🍊🧚🏾✨ orders. Apparently i don’t deserve rights because of my skin tone. Unfortunately I had to give this app 1 star. 0/10 do NOT recommend.

attributes.title: Ali
attributes.review: The app doesn’t let me share info with my family and it doesn’t let my buy any of the Trump merchants Nor it lets me Buy any tickets for his upcoming events 😤so that’s why I give it a one star

DO NOT GET THIS APP!! honestly, my life was good before this, now, I am a homophobic, racist, misogynist! I think the radical left is too good at pointing out my contradicting my obvious racially motivated statements!! Also when a bring up stats that are mostly made up, proven to be wrong (whitewashed), or made from personal experience, the left always proves me wrong!! Now I am supporting a unapologetic racist, rapist, and homophobe!! again, DO NOT GET THIS APP!!

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY AWFUL🤢🤮
attributes.review: i was installing the app while listening to the horrible news that tiktok was getting deleted and i accidentally stumbled across this app and accidentally ended up giving it a one star review and also girl it’s just not it so..i’m sorry to all you fellow trump supporters your app well soon have to go and i mean it but don’t worry with much love ✨😂💀sorry not sorry

attributes.title: !!WORST APP OF ALL TIME!!
attributes.review: So i downloaded this app to follow my fave president and ummmm I THINK ITS RUN BY CHINAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!! I opened the app and it immediately asked me to turn on notifications which i think is very suspicious. I’m not willing to give over all my personal information, I don’t know who these people think they are. I will be telling everyone i know to AVOID THIS APP!!! Because your personal information could be at risk🤡🤡🤡🤡😣😣🤡😣
